'''Nether forest vegetation''' is a [[feature]] that generates patches of surface vegetation in the [[crimson forest]] and [[warped forest]] biomes.

== Generation ==
{{Incomplete section|Technical generation details}}
Nether forest vegetation takes one of 5 possible blocks:

* {{BlockLink|Crimson Roots}}
* {{BlockLink|Crimson Fungus}}
* {{BlockLink|Warped Roots}}
* {{BlockLink|Warped Fungus}}
* {{BlockLink|Nether Sprouts}}

The spread (size) of the patch, the number of blocks in the patch, and the rarity depends on the biome.

=== Crimson Forest ===
In [[crimson forest]]s, these patches are usually [[crimson roots]] and [[crimson fungus]]. Uncommonly, [[warped fungus]] will also generate, scaring away [[hoglin]]s that happen to wander nearby.

=== Warped Forest ===
Unlike crimson forests, [[warped forest]]s generate with all possible types of nether forest vegetation. Commonly, these are [[warped roots]], [[nether sprouts]], and warped fungus. Crimson roots and crimson fungus will uncommonly appear in this biome.

=== Config ===
{{main|Configured feature}}
{{el|java}}:
<section begin="config"/><div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound|config}}
** {{nbt|compound|state_provider}} The block to use.
*** {{nbt inherit/block_state_provider}}
** {{nbt|int|spread_width}} The horizonal distance to spread to. The max width is <code>spread_width * 2 -1</code>. Must be a positive integer.
** {{nbt|int|spread_height}} The vertical distance to spread. The max height is <code>spread_height * 2 -1</code>. Must be a positive integer.
</div><section end="config"/>

{{Collapse|title=An example|outerstyle=margin: 0.5rem 0|head=1}}
<syntaxhighlight lang="json">
{
  "type": "minecraft:nether_forest_vegetation",
  "config": {
    "spread_height": 4,
    "spread_width": 8,
    "state_provider": {
      "type": "minecraft:simple_state_provider",
      "state": {
        "Name": "minecraft:nether_sprouts"
      }
    }
  }
}
</syntaxhighlight>
{{Collapse|tail=1}}
